resources.string: Learn how to make a drone
Expected changes in the next version
Our Mission is yo to help You Be a Smart and safe Drone Pilot.
ArduPilot is a open source autopilot system supporting multi-copters, traditional helicopters, fixed wing aircraft and rovers.
My name is Gulzar, and I am obsessed with FPV flying. I\'ve been in the hobby for quite a while now, and I live, eat, and sleep quadcopters and FPV.

You will gain introduction to the mechanics of flight and the design of quadrotor flying robots and will be able to develop dynamic models, derive controllers, and synthesize planners for operating in three dimensional environments.
We provide a place for makers like you to share your designs, collaborate with one another, and learn how to take your product to market.
We Love to Fly, We love Drones.. . This is the social Network for Drones, RC Models, Robots and much more.

Starting in 2010 a number of technology and engineering factors came together - all leading to almost unlimited possibilities in lover cost and more capable flying drones for consumers, hobbyists, photographers and other possible light commercial uses.
As the market leader in easy-to-fly drones and aerial photography systems, DJI quadcopters have become the standart in consumer drone technology.
Parrot designs, developers and markets consumer products for smartphones and tablets as well as high technology solution in Automotive and UAV business
RcBazaar is India\'s largest and coolest hobby super store dedicated to Radio Control helicopters, aeroplanes, jets, gliders, balsa kits, spares and accessories
RC Mumbai is a next level hobby shop in Mumbai which provides the highest quality items for the cheapest price possible.
HobbyXyz.com is a Delhi based RC store which deals in every hobby product like your hobby plane, boats, Trains and many more.
Robokits India is fast growing research, development and assemble house with its own online sales front, store front and sales distribution network for robotic products.
Pooja Electronics was started way back in 1998 mainly dealing into Broadcast Equipment.
